website_summaries.verdict: The best play or practice basketball to choose if you want the choice of different sizes with the same quality build.
pros: Comes in youth, teen, and adult sizes (size 5 to 7)
Ball's surface has a more textured, pebble feel for better control during play
Ball does a good job of retaining shape after a lot of use
cons: Requires some time to break in for the best feel and results

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ball for a child! My son is 5 and his trainer said that this ball will serve him well until he is about 10, and then he'll have to switch to a larger ball. FYI the gold lettering is QUITE gold... a bit ghetto fabulous, if you like that sort of thing. It will for sure stand out at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: naposaurus

customer_reviews.title: Kids size
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for 9 year old. Perfect for youngster cause the size is a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good grip!
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor/outdoor ball that has good grip on any surface. It was the right size for my daughter's team and even the coach remarked on how nice it was. All the girls on the team loved playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: jamarine_73

customer_reviews.title: This ball falls flat.
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this ball is fine. However, it looses air very fast. A week following my son's first practice, it was completely flat. Meanwhile, my Spaulding was still at full pressure. Be sure to read through the negative reviews on this ball to see if others speak about this ball not sealing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Woman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Deflated quickly after only a small amount of use in a driveway. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Basketball playing grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson started basketball this year & this basketball is perfect for his small hands!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Rogers

customer_reviews.title: a great basketball for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: a great basketball for my 7 year old, both indoor and out on the driveway. Yes this is 27.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Groniger

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a week. Now it's all lumpy
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice outdoor ball for about 7 days and then all of a sudden it's completely warped and has crazy lumps all over it. Planning on returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Upsetbeltbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good use for my 8 year old boy. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jen2006

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old, perfect size, and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: melissa stuart

customer_reviews.title: The ball looks really cool. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The ball looks really cool. Unfortunately, the bounce is horrible. I got this to be my 7 year olds indoor ball but it is a pain to dribble, even for me. You have to really push it into the ground to keep it going or it just dies out. It acts like it is flat though it is fully inflated. Not the best ball to get a kid that just learning how to dribble. I would love to return it but we waited to long. He now has a Nike and a Spalding ball that he prefers using. No more over priced Under Armour balls.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 5 yr old just now learning to play the game
customer_reviews.author: Elmo P.

customer_reviews.title: Good ball but I'm not so sure about Outdoor use as described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 6 year old son to use outdoors. He loved it but the designs were all coming off after a few days. Took a few stars for that since it shouldn't have worn off so fast because it's listed as an "indoor/outdoor" ball.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer123

product_meta.title: Under Armour 495 Indoor/Outdoor Basketball, Youth/Size 5
product_meta.description:
Indoor/Outdoor Basketball features tackified composite cover for excellent grip and feel. Deep channels for better control. 80% nylon windings for excellent shape retention. 100% butyl bladder for maximum aire retention. Youth Size 5.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Indoor/Outdoor Basketball features tackified composite cover for excellent grip and feel. Deep channels for better control. 80% nylon windings for excellent shape retention. 100% butyl bladder for maximum air retention. Youth Size 5.
feature_bullets: 100% Butyl Bladder for Maximum Air Retention
For optimal performance, additional inflation may be required. Ball pump not included.
UA GRIPSKIN Composite for Ultimate Grip and Feel
